name: Columbine
startIntroPart1: Great Dylan Klebold, you led all Columbiners to the bright and away from being bullied.
startIntroPart2: Columbiners, an unlucky nation, wandering across the world, no one want will accept, because they don't agree with Klebold.
declaringWar: Great, wise decision. You have completely upset me and Eric, you upset all Columbiners. It's time for you death now.
attacked: You dare to attack on us?! YOU WILL BE IN TRASH BIN OF HISTORY SOON!!!
defeated: You...you global bully... Wait! One day, me, Dylan Klebold, will back with all Columbiners and remove your nation!
introduction: We Columbiners are coming for peace, of course if you not bully us.
neutralHello: Hello, in name of Cassie Bernall, we come for peace.
neutralNo: I and Eric not agree with that fuck!
Rachel and Cassie will upset for this!
neutralYes: Your decision is more great than prom in school!
hateHello: Don't try to upset us, global bully.
hateNo: You are upset us, global bully.
Eric and me are not agreeing to that!
Go fuck away! If you don't want to be in trash bin of history.
afterPeace: We just tired on remove your nation, global bully. When Eric and me got interest again, we will back.
tradeRequest: Under the name of Cassie Bernall and Rachel Scott, we offer this trade to you.
